Entry.1:
On night duty at 6pm. Wrote to Jennie, Home, Bertha, Clare, H.Hickson Marion Clarke, Laura, Mrs Whitehead

Very tired 4a.m.

F
Entry.2:
Met Reg. Platt from Burwood

Try to sleep. Get 1 Lon.

F
Entry.3:
Wrote H Hey

No sleep again

F
Entry.4:
Short arm which I miss.

No sleep again

F
Entry.5:
Meet Clarry Sweeny who was Ted’s & Gill John’s mate at Warwick Farm our night cook. Recd. letter from Marie

Wrote to Mem. Maisie Carter 4AM

F
Entry.6:
Wrote to M.R.L. at 3am. Wrote to Roy. 12 mid-night. Recd. letter from Roy.

No sleep whatever

W
Entry.7:
Walked to Durrington with Dave & Rube King. Walked Home alone. Met Douglas from Bondi. Recd letter from Jennie & wrote in answer

W
Entry.8:
Cut our drawers & made one pair up. Ordered Piece of music at the shop.

F
Entry.9:
Recd. letter from Auntie Annie Write to Auntie. Snowing at 12am. Catch 19 Ward playing cards, Ellis goes for a Bike Ride.

Snow & rain
Entry.11:
Recd. letter from Marie & wrote in (7) answer. Parcels arrive also Guinea Pigs.

W
Entry.12:
Read book. Mee & Myn & all about Jennie

Dremt of the waste of M. 

F
Entry.13:
Read & had yarn with Wright the Pro. Cricketer

Recd letter from Jennie

F
Entry.14:
Wrote to Jennie & read Book. Lone Marie

Slept in bed all day

F
Entry.15:
Recd letter from H. Hay. 2 Bea Mum, France, Chris, Cards from Queen & Mrs Mcl.

Walked to Village of Millstone. Very small Kirk & mill few stones & bricks all that was left of Poet Addison’s Home in Vicar’s Garden. 

F
Entry.16:
Recd letter from George & lovely Card from Lily

Walked to Fighledean. Saw many aeroplanes. Village Black Smiths Tree & grave. Old stone images in church garden Good tea & walked the plank. Had to see Colonel about absence from Pay.

F
Entry.17:
Wrote to Mum, George, Lil Bess. Queen. D. Nin dreams He marries L.R.M. 

Nothing Doing.

F
Entry.18:
Wrote to M.R.L (5) Recd. letter from M.R.L Walked to Newton Toney with Dave, Percy & Drake. Very tired.

ICE
Entry.19:
Recd. letter from Jennie & H Hey. Card. Stayed in bed all day.

ICE
Entry.20:
Recd. letter from Roy & Bess. Photo of Dad & Mum & Self on Steps. Sent Book of Aust. Birds & flowers & 2 page letter to M.R.L. Go for a walk with Nin round the Camps.

ICE
Entry.21:
Go to Soccer match on Tap Ground. Write to Chris France, Mrs McL. & Roy. Billy goes to Lark Hill for Duty.

F
Entry.22:
Wrote to Jennie &Home Sent Photos. Stayed in bed all day.

F
Entry.23:
Ice. Recd. letter from M.R.L. Sgt McKenzie gets knocked by motor. Walked to Durrington Milstone. I had tea out & met another Melbourne Blatherskite of a woman V.A.D.

F
Entry.24:
Ice Wrote to M.R.L. & . L. Robson Lottie Watson & Jessie Henderson Sewed shirts for Dave. Took from 11.30pm to 5am to write to M.R.L. Dreamt of I and with Marg Millar & Shipwrecks.

Going to Douglas.

ICE
Entry.25:
Recd. letter from Kingsway re watch. Wrote in return. Wrote to Mary Lindsay & Hilda, Charlie Bates came here. Slept nearly all day. Had no food from 10.30pm yesterday till 7pm this day.

ICE
Entry.26:
Recd. letters from Marge. Bess Dave Vernon. Nettie & Jess Mather. Slept during morning thats all.

ICE
Entry.27:
Recd. letters from M.R.L & Jennie wrote to M.R.L. Goaled at the Footy match & concert in Palladium. Poor Montgomery dies at 5.45p.m. Sent Postal Note for my watch. Billy Ali comes over for the week end

ICE
Entry.28:
Slept most of the day. Very very cold. We learn that this is the coldest January for 30 years. I think so too.

ICE
Entry.29:
Recd. letter from Dulce. I got to bed at 7am & got U. Room at 10.30pm Lunch on Cocoa & biscuits. Go to Figheldean with Mrs Grundy. Wrote to Bess. Jennie.

ICE
Entry.30:
Recd. Parcel from Hilda Hickson Another cove with fits comes in. I go for a walk over the hills. Snowing from 8pm

F Ice
Entry.31:
Recd. watch from Jewellers. Played Hymns for Lantern Lecture. Pay Day. My last night on

Put in for leave.

F Ice
Entry.32:
Paraded for leave & received good promises. Went for a walk round the Hills. I got my own Bed in my own Room.

F ice
Entry.33:
I sleep the round of the clock & 2 hours over. Resume in B. Divn for work

F ice
Entry.34:
Go for a walk to Amesbury with Dave. Go to pictures Buy fruit & dine in officers mess.

Ellis goes to Weymouth I am Batman & fix him up. Recd letters from M.R.L & Jennie

Snowing
Entry.35:
Play for Church again. Wrote Home. Jess. Nette. Dave. Vernon. Arthur Little. Margaret. Slept 14 hours last night

Ice
Entry.36:
Snow Still on ground Have long hard Day. Ellis returns from Weymouth & we have sausages for supper

Ice
Entry.37:
Snow Still on Ground We change our style of organisation from Ward Treatment to Hut Treatment.

Ice
Entry.38:
Snow still on ground. Write to Dulce Butell

Dressing in C Ward Starts at 2pm.

Ice
Entry.39:
Recd letters from Marg. Doris. & 4 from Home

Ice
Entry.40:
recd. letter from Auntie Annie Scribbled notes to Jennie & M.R.L.

Ice
Entry.41:
Went for a walk with J. Rob. to Milstone & Durrington

Ice
Entry.42:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. Played for Kirk & for service in Prison Ward. Wrote to M.R.L.

Thaw
Entry.43:
Recd. Comforts from Sydney. Wrote Jennie & Aunt Annie Overflow of Patients

F
Entry.45:
Played for Lantern Service

Nothing Doing Went to see "Some Girls"

F
Entry.46:
Opening of Billiard Table. Everything very nice

F
Entry.47:
Recd. letter from Jennie. Met Reg. Keirle from Perham on Escort Duty. Billy Ali was over too. Dreamt about 2 of M & Shipwrecked again. Rained at 5pm. 

F
Entry.48:
Misty & I drill defaulters Walk to Amesbury alone & dine. Meet Reub King & Bricky & dine again at Amesbury. Walk Home & tell about Factory life I dreamed all about it tonight. Go to Pictures in Amesbury.

F
Entry.49:
Play for Kirk. Nothing doing

Wrote. Dad. Mum. George. PC’s

Recd. Xmas Card from Alice Mother only.

F
Entry.50:
D. Reub & I go to London by 3.19. arrive at 6.30. Go to Morris Hotel 11 Crane St. Coliseum Theatre & walk to Waterloo Bridge

W
Entry.51:
Smithfield meat market & Edmonton by train. 2 hours with White walk West End. Go to Adelphi to see High Jinks. D & R with 2 nurses. 

F
Entry.52:
2d shave at Belge Barber meet Sgt. Major who knew Roy Tred. & Grace. Kearns. Meet White at Nelson Monu. 10.30am & taxi to Tower. Meet 3 Aust Nurses from No 2 A.G.H. Names Visit St James PK & Hyde Park. I go half way home with White. Past Whitehall & the abbey. Meet Peggy Davies & other Nurse Train from Waterloo 8.15 Bulford 12pm

F
Entry.53:
Letters from Roy & Marie I have Pharyngitis Laryngitis Conjuctivitis & . I get good Treatment.

Write to M.R.L. (6)

W
Entry.54:
I loaf & read. Send two parcels to White. Sent P.C’s Home of Tower Views. Wrote Home. E & D go to Albany Wand’s

F
Entry.55:
Wrote Marg & Dot. Major Raffan visits Hosp. again.

Nothing to Report

F & muddy
Entry.56:
E. D & I go to L. Hill to Billy. Meet Martin Wright I cook on Tea in Durrington. We have a bonzer walk through the mud. Ellis rouses at the mud.

F
Entry.57:
Wrote P.C. to Alice Meth.

Dave & I go to Albany Wand’s Show

F
Entry.58:
Recd. letter from Bess. I go to Fighledean with Kingy. Round through Durrington Home. Meet Marjory, We also fall in the ditches

F
Entry.59:
Recd. letter from Bess & Nette

Dream that Q.O.M. marries Mr Reid. 

Very Busy but no news.

F
Entry.60:
I close canteen Two

Recd. letters from Auntie. M.R.L. Rained during the night & foggy till 10 am. Recd. letter from Bess. Mem. H.Hey & Cyril. I go & watch our Footy Team & spend the evening at Durrington with Martin Wellington & Marjory

F
Entry.61:
Recd. letters from Home (7) Bess. Hilda. Dot. Queen. Ellis goes to Grimsby. Gen. Howse visits Hosp & combing out Starts. Receive news that I have been writing to an unknown Girl.

F
Entry.62:
Very Busy. I go to see "Lion & the Mouse" with Dave & the Boys. Welshy from Milson’s Is. came from Brighton on Escort Duty.

Wrote to Jennie. Roy. White & M.R.L.

F. Windy.
Entry.63:
Recd. letter from John Lawton. Billy comes over. I go to L. Hill for a walk. Wrote to Mem. Nette. Auntie A. Bess. Sent. Tabs for Q.O.M.

F&W. Snow
Entry.64:
Ellis made Sergeant. I write to Queen & H.Hey. Ellis arrives from Gy . at East Post.

Nothing starting doing

W
Entry.65:
Wrote to Jennie. John Dad & Mum. Very wet day. I do the pay for 1/- issue

F
Entry.66:
Letters from Maisie Hudson – Marjorie. 5 from Home. Bessie P.C. from Mrs Clarke. 60 Patients come 60 Patients sent to P.House.

F
Entry.67:
Letters from Marg. Went to bed sick last night at 5pm & am sent to staff ward to stay in bed. I have a sponge down.

W
Entry.68:
Letter from Dulce Butell

A little bit better

Snow
Entry.70:
We have concert by the Razzle Dazzle Comedy Co. in our ward. We have the song "A little bit of Ribbon, a little bit of lace, & a little bit of silk as well"

F & Dull
Entry.71:
Wrote to M.R.L. Dulce Marjorie Hudson. Margaret M.

Read Book of Charles Dickens Reprinted Pieces

F&W
Entry.72:
Disch. from Hosp. Return to my Room. Wrote John Lawton Billy came over from L. Hill

F
Entry.73:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. Wrote to M.R.L. made a pair of white drawers. Started indoor work again.

F
Entry.74:
Recd. letter from Aunt. Annie

Ellis goes to lark Hill on D.C.M. all day. E. D. & I go to the theatre at night.

F
Entry.75:
Wrote to Mrs Clarke & Dad. Mum & George. Ellis goes to DCM at 2pm. All unit classified but me. I am too busy.

F
Entry.76:
Glorious Day & Dave & I walk to Fighledean. We meet Billy & His Cobbers & have Tea with them. We walk Home round through Durrington. I go straight to bed on my return pretty knocked out.

F
Entry.77:
Dreamt of Mrs M. Wrote to Bess. Recd. parcel from Bess. Lovely day. I play for Kirk & in the jail. I go to Salisbury with Mr Hunt. We notice upturned motors on the road. Go to Cathedral Service Twice & to canon Myers for Tea & Supper. Have hell of run over a mile for train.

F 18/3/17 Mon Recd. letter from Jennie

Am very tired after Strenuous Day. Dreamt of Burkes in swimming costumes
Entry.78:
men go to P. House 

F & Wet
Entry.79:
Rain & then snow & fine all the afternoon. Receive letter from Roy. Wrote to Bess & Roy Frances & Jessie Mather

F
Entry.80:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. Ellis goes to Salisbury & returns on Motor Bike. I go to Lantern Lecture but do not play. So spend the evening with Mr Hunt & listen to Poetry.

Snow
Entry.81:
Snowed 4 times & each time the sun came out. Reg. Keirle was over on Escort again. Write to Cyril. Aunt Annie. M.R.L. & Jennie. Receive box of flowers from Aunt Annie.

W
Entry.82:
I clean up for trip to London. Go to bed early.

F
Entry.83:
Leave by motor at 8.30am. Leave Salisbury at 10.10. Dinner at Lyons. 1pm to Dartford. 3pm return. Canon Street at 4pm. Edmonton 5.15pm. Lyons 7pm. Vaudeville Theatre. "Some". No good.

Sunday Hyde Park. Rotten Row. All round the Park. Dinner. Madame Tussauds via Hampstead, Marylebone Street. Went to the Abbey & saw Horse Guards who were rotten. Hear Boy Soprano

F
Entry.84:
General Mobilization

Saw where Chas 1 was beheaded Round Regent St Leicester Square. About 30 Theatres. Caught 5.50 travelled with 4 Scots 2 Tommies 2 N.Z’s. arrive Home 10.15pm

F&W
Entry.85:
Hail. Rain. Snow. Sunshine. All in the Hour. Nothing doing much. Send overcoat to be cleaned. Write Mum. 2 PC’s each to Dad & George. Reg Keirle was over again.

F
Entry.86:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. We move to No3 Ward & have a straighten up

F
Entry.87:
I write to M.R.L. Cyril & Jennie. Recd letter from Jennie. Play for Lantern Lecture

F
Entry.88:
Don’t remember anything

Recd. letter from Cyril. Ellis & I both about Condon St Burwood

F
Entry.89:
Recd. letters from Mem. Otto & Grandma.

F
Entry.90:
We go to see jack & the Beanstalk We sit in the front Row see too much Ellis much struck with two old Ballet Girls.

F
Entry.91:
Reg. Keirle over again Snow at midnight.

Play for Kirk & Jail. Go out for a walk by myself to Durrington Lark Hill meet Sgt Creft, Roley Hole’s pal – lovely moonlight night.

W & Snow
Entry.92:
Capt Gibbs comes up for an Hour’s chat. 

Long day Hard work

Jim. Robertson visits us. Snowing hard at night

Snow
Entry.93:
heavy falls of snow heaviest for the season. Glorious sight. I am Policeman till 9.30 & go over to Mr Hunt for Cocoa & Cards.

F
Entry.94:
I again play for Lantern Lecture & go to Bulford afterward

Wrote to Cyril & recd letter from Jennie.

F & W
Entry.95:
Write to Mum. Nette. Bess. Otto. & George. Recd. letters from Mum & Bess & P.C. from Nettie. Otto

F
Entry.96:
Good Fri I play for Kirk. We have a very bad Friday. Ellis & I walk to Durrington after tea & have no money so walk back again Hungry. Recd. letters Grannie. Mem. Parcel from Nette

F
Entry.97:
I receive Marie’s letter. D E & I walk to Amesbury to the Pictures. We are all dead weary on arrival. We see the Picture "For Australia’s Honour & it shows views of Sydney. We wearily set out to walk back but do not notice the distance coming back 

Receive letter & Photo from Roy.

F
Entry.98:
Daylight saving at 2a.m.

I shake up the Jail Birds. Mr Hunt & I go to Milstone Church & walk to Durrington afterwards. I meet Mr Jones of Mrs Dunns Dancing Class. Corp in the 4th T.B.

F
Entry.99:
D & I go to Albany Wands Show. Up to Putty. We should have gone on leave but missed.

Showery
Entry.100:
It snows for both parades. I feel sick & go to bed at 6.30pm. Waken up pretty well next morning.

Showery
Entry.101:
Recd. letters from Hilda & Dad. also Paper. Wrote to M.R.L. Mem. Roy. Jennie & George.

Old nasal trouble comes on again.

F
Entry.102:
I go to London without a pass. Go to Southall & Richmond. No-one at Home. Mr H’s Birthday . Had nice talk all about myself & others. I sleep well but have a bad cold.

F
Entry.103:
Maud & I go to Surbiton via Richmond Terrace & Kingston. A glorious day & a glorious ride. Sat on the mat with Lena by the fireside I rush for train. Have Photo Taken get . Spend 3 miserable Hours in Salisbury

W
Entry.104:
Recd. letters from H. Hey. Mum P cds Bess & Marie. Draw pay I am very Home Sick & off my Tucker. D & E go to Salisbury I go for a walk with Bill all over Artillery Hill. Then write to M.R.L. Mrs Harbert Nette & Gramma Davies. Renovate overcoat

F
Entry.105:
Glorious day. Play for Kirk & go for walk to see Marjorie. Write to Mum and OS Merrett. Jess Mather

Recd. letters from Edie Taubman. French English

W
Entry.106:
Nasty rainy day. We go to the Pictures stand in the rain. Show very good. See good girl dance & Pipe player

F
Entry.107:
King George Review. Ellis goes over to see it. Recd. letter from Cyl. Wrote to H. Hey & Cyl. Bill H. & I walk to Stonehenge & go to Pictures at Amesbury.

F & Wet
Entry.108:
Recd. letter from Jennie & letter & Parcel from Mrs Trotter. All inoculated again Ellis goes to Harefield. Dave & I go to Palladium. Rotten Show. Wrote to Mrs Trotter.

F & very warm
Entry.109:
Very sick with Inoculation. Go to bed very early. Wrote to Marge. Bess. Doris. Maisie. Dave & Frank’s cobber come 

Wrote to Jennie.

F & HOT
Entry.110:
recd. comforts from Mrs Stephens & New Hat from Q.M I play cricket & get very hot. Have shower apres & go straight to Bed

Dull
Entry.111:
Nothing doing. E & I go for walk round Block. I am transferred to No4 Spitoon in lieu of No2 apres 17 months Lt Col. Grigor in lieu of major. My arm is very sore after playing cricket.

F
Entry.112:
Play for Kirk. Ellis goes to Amesbury. Go to Durrington church to service. Very nice. Hear Parson at Intonation. AWFUL. Wrote to Dad. Recd. letter from MRL. 

F
Entry.113:
Lovely day. Wrote to M.R.L. Catch 12.27 from Bulford. Arrive London at 3.30. Walk round Strand up Holborn. Buy shoes & Dave meet Pals. Catch 8.30 from Kings X arrive Grimsby 5.30am

F
Entry.114:
Lovely day. D & I with Tommy son. Docks & Trawlers We all got to Cleethorpes in the afternoon. Too tired to go out at night. So to bed at 10pm

F
Entry.115:
Lovely day. Go to buy fish and get scaled. Music all morning. Motor to Louth in afternoon. Bonzer time. Go to Palace Vaudeville at night. See Troupe & go to Stage door and a chat. See Wm of Orange Statue & Wilberforce

F
Entry.116:
Lovely Day. Catch 10.7am train to Hull. Go to East Park & see lovely Summer House. Go to art Gallery & see Canadian War Picture. Meet Mr Joseph Bush. Go to see Diana of Dobsons at Theatre.

F
Entry.117:
Lovely day. Stay with Jennie all morn. Catch the 12.5 train to Kings X. Walk from Leicester Square to Waterloo. Drive home in Daylight at 9pm. Recd. Photos & letters & read them in Bed.

F
Entry.118:
Lovely day. Sent photo to Jennie, M.R.L. Cyril & Roy. Ellis goes to Salisbury. Photo to Mum. Wrote to Mum Dad, George & Edie Taubman in French & English. Played cricket. Sore arm & shin. Recd. letters from Jess, Marion Clare Bess (2) Laura. Amy Cocks Mrs Trotter Dulce. Dot. Ida Dean. George. Dad. Mum. Cyril

F
Entry.119:
Wrote to Laura & Bess. Played for Kirk. Go to Kirk at Bulford Sent P.C. to Doris & wrote to Dulce Butell. Saw induction of new Parson & heard archdeacon preach.

F
Entry.120:
Lovely day. Wrote P.C. to Emmie Johnstone. Inoculated again. Play cricket on oval. Arm very sore. Go to bed at 8pm. Sleepless night on account of arm. Pay Parade.

F
Entry.121:
Wrote to Marion. Ida & Wal. Amy. Played cricket again. Have Cricket meeting. Practise. Polling Day starts. Go to bed very late at 10.30pm

F
Entry.122:
Ellis goes to S’Bury. I play cricket am No 11. Score 3 runs but put on 30 for last wicket. Am called Ranji by patients on Oval. Dave is Captain. Go to bed very hungry. Win Match. 107-47. Glorious weather.

F
Entry.123:
Glorious & Perfect Day. I go to Albany Ward’s alone. Send films to be developed. Lovely moonlight night. Dreamt of Marjory & Queenie Westy.

F
Entry.124:
Recd. letters from Esme & Jennie. Wrote to Jennie & Practised Cricket again. Do no geed at all.

F
Entry.125:
Very hot. Go to S’bury with Keogh & Dave. Go to Mrs for Tea. Movie & walk around River walk & Cathedral Close. Have plenty of nice food etc. Very cold at night & having left off Cardigan catch a very slight cold. Had letter from Mem & Cyril.

F
Entry.126:
Open air service & I don’t play. Go to Cholderton to Kirk. Lovely old church. See Nelson’s old home & where Prince of O. was entertained on way to London. 

F
Entry.127:
Again Practise Cricket. Go to bed early. Nin comes up to room & we talk. Wrote to Cyl. 7pm parades start.

F
Entry.128:
Recd. letter from Jennie. Wrote. Doris (16) Mem. Mrs Trotter. E & I went to Albany Wards. Weather much cooler again.

F
Entry.129:
E. go to S’bury. Nin makes 54. Our tem win easily by an innings I darn socks & mend white drawers.

W till 10am & then a lovely day
Entry.130:
Wrote to Mrs Stephen. Recd letters from Clare. Frances. Nette. 4 from Home. Bertha. Bess. Nell. Hilda. Dulce & Maisie Carter. Watched Cricket H.M.AT 8-120 Declared A.D.H 5-109. Drawn game.

F & Hot
Entry.131:
Letter from Marge & Paper from Al Methven. Frank goes to Wmouth. Wrote to Jennie. Bess. Home. Marge. Dulce. Hilda. Maisie. Clare. The ward is very quiet to night.

F
Entry.132:
A bit of a thunderstorm & a few points of Rain. D. Nett. & I go to S’bury. I am very hungry & have 4 meals in S’bury. Meet Charlie Wild in Cathedral & Bill Baker in Street, also Saunders from fire Station. We all go to Town Hall for Tucker but Chas & I only dine. We stay to hear the Pipers. We talk to bonnie English Lady. Go to Guest Home to eat & also to Congregational Hall. Wrote to Bert. & Mrs Stephens & Nette

F & real Hot. Perfect Summers Day.
Entry.133:
Recd. letter from Al Methven Wrote to Frances Nell. Esme. Kath McGarry. Al. Meth. Go for a roam on the Down & a rabbit jump out of a bush as I jump over.

F
Entry.134:
Recd. letters from Col. Lawton & Roy. Wrote to M.R.L. & Mr Love Edie. Taub. P.C. France. Go to Albany Wards show. N.T.B.

F
Entry.135:
I go practise for cricket till very late & then go to bed early. Learnt a bit more French

F
Entry.136:
Play cricket Get 0 N.O. & field 2 balls. We lose by 1 W & 40 or runs. Letter from April & I wrote sent £1 Ellis was at Salisbury & I had to sneak out.

Rain all morning
Entry.137:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. of only one line. I burn every letter in my possession Go to D’ton & round Stonehenge Hotel for a walk. Play my first game of Snooker on Table 2 England

F
Entry.138:
Ellis goes to G’tham & Gy Recd. letter from Jennie. Wrote to M.R.L. & Jennie. Went over to Mrs Hunts Room

F
Entry.139:
Recd. letter from White & answer it. I sew white pants all day & at night. No cricket. Recd. 2 letters from Home & 1 from Bess.

F & W
Entry.140:
Fine in the morning & heavy thunderstorm at night. Sew & play cards with Hunt

F
Entry.141:
Go to Albany Wards & count male out all the time.

F
Entry.142:
Practise Cricket for one hour. Recd. paper from Alice Methven.

F & W
Entry.143:
The three Nuns go to Bath . We meet pretty Blonde in Train from P’mouth. We take train at Bath over the Hills to Crombe Down. Net & Nin have girls. I have none. Nett catches Train. Bonny Time

Dull
Entry.144:
Wrote P.C’s to dad Mum & Nancy. Played Cricket Canteen Corporal again. First time for over 5 months. Finish the Pants, Look very nice. Dreamt Peg takes me to Church

F
Entry.145:
Wrote to Marg. Bess. M.R.L. Recd. letter from Jennie. Practise Cricket again.

F
Entry.146:
Lovely Hot Day. I go to Salisbury with Laurie. To to Edmonds Home. Walk all around Salisbury alone & get very very tired again. I hear Martin Wellington sing Where my Caravan has . Have quite a nice time & reach Home tres fatigue. Posted parcel to Jennie in Salisbury

W
Entry.147:
Very heavy rain from Thunderstorm Nin & I go to church at Belford. N.T.B. but Nin. not like the Stunt.

F
Entry.148:
Lovely Day. We all mow & roll wicket. Practise for good 3 hours. Ellis brings Carlos into supper at 12.30am.

F
Entry.149:
Real Hot. Pay Parade. Write to George. See Basil Gordon who is a Duty from W’ham. Wrote Jennie. Practised Cricket. Thunderstorm & plenty of Rain.

W & F
Entry.150:
Rained last night but fine after 10am. Our Boys Beat Tommies by 50 runs in two innings match. Go to Albany Wards alone. Good show. Finish book in bed " Foe". Dine with Dave a letter from Bath.

F & windy
Entry.151:
Walk to Amesbury. Visit Mrs Bennett at Bulford whose relative Mrs Joseph Bush is. Dine at Queensbury . Talk to Ladies down by the mill who have a & Croquet Lawn. Go to Church army Hut near Bridge. meet two ladies on the Weir Bridge & walk Home with them.

Dull & Showery
Entry.152:
Work all day 7 go to Albany Wards again with Dave. Recd. long letter from M.R.L. Dream of Belle Nicoll

F
Entry.153:
Go to S’Bury with Laurie. See Mayoral Procession & distribution of . Go to Council Chambers & stay over 3 Hours. Go out to do shopping & learn of Races at L. Hill return to watch Peirrots & walk home to Close. Go to Mrs Edmonds for supper & have a lovely walk Home in the moonlight. Write to M.R.L. & post in Salisbury

W
Entry.154:
Walk to Tidworth with Dave to see Cricket match. Come home & dine well. Lovely walk through the daisy fields which were like a carpet worked in flowers. 

F
Entry.155:
Nothin doin. Play Cricket for an Hour. I begin Training for the 100 yds Championship am no good at all & have a cold to start with as usual. Wrote Home 4 P.C’s.

F
Entry.156:
Go to Bath with Dave. See all the Parks & dine with a Friend at "The Old Red House". We watch the Tennis & dine again at the same place. We get a souvenir. 

F
Entry.157:
E. goes to S’bury. I practise at the nets for 3 hours. Am Canteen Corp. Yarn to Mac for an Hour before going to Bed. Recd letter from Jennie.

F
Entry.158:
Wrote to Jennie. Our boys win Cricket easily. Ellis & I have a run I am dreadful out of the Holes 

F
Entry.159:
I dream of M.R.L like the "Man from Macedonia". I can not go cos have no Troos. I go to Albany wards with Krogh. Come home go for a run. Then patch pants before I go to sleep.

F
Entry.160:
Glorious day. I go to S’bury Row on River alone. Go to the House for a few Hours after hearing the 15th T.B. Band in Town Hall. I have a very nice time. See the lovely Honeysuckle again all over the Porches in the Garden & Peonys & Poppies also see the spot where the Cathedral Bell Tower stood marked by the dark shade of green. Had a letter from Cyril at Southall.

F
Entry.161:
Wrote PC. to George. Capt. Ellis visits us for a few Hours. After dinner E & I with Hunt Mac & Krogh go to Bulford for a swim. It is very cold but we enjoy it very much. I go for a run & then sit in bed to finish my white shorts 

F
Entry.162:
Spend an Hour at the nets & have a few sprints with some N.Z. Sgts. Do no good. Recd. letter from R.L. Sit in bed & answer it. Ellis goes to Amesbury on Bike.

F
Entry.163:
Go to S’bury to my Friend. Go for a walk to the Riverside Walk & go to Organ Recital. Have Tea & supper there. Have usual good time. Pay Parade.

F
Entry.164:
Recd. letter from Jennie. Wrote Home & to Cyril. again I am improving. E. goes to Salisbury. Hear that D. Lord’s Brother has his hand blown off.

F
Entry.165:
Played Cricket for 3 hrs & then trained for running. Was Reliev. Corp. had to go to every ward, finish at 11 with S/Sgt. Bertie. Had 2 papers from Home.

F
Entry.166:
Gen. Shep. Goes to P.Down Recd letter from Peggy. Bess & Dad. Go to Wards with CW Hunt. Recd. paper from Isle of Man. Promotions come out for more N.C.O’s. dated 24.4.17. Wrote to Peggy.

F
Entry.167:
& Hot as Hades. Con don’t come & we walk to Bulford & get one. Run in Race & get 2 or 3rd in heat all Pro’s out & was outclassed. Had awful walk back. We have Tea in our Room with Scotty & Ted Cox. We are knocked out completely. The Country is looking an absolute Picture but rain is wanted Badly. Our Boys get trounced at Cricket

F & awful Hot
Entry.168:
Wrote to Jennie Mary. Nette. Bess, Mrs Stephen Jess. Ossie. Bertha. Edie. Alma Mrs Mel. Otto. Dulce. Roy. We raid one of the wards at 10pm but get nothing

F
Entry.169:
E. goes to P.D for D.C.M. & is O.Sgt. I’m Canteen Corporal Sent Photo to Connie. No cricket at all.

F
Entry.170:
Wrote Home E. D & I go to Pictures. Rotten show but we laugh. Aust. Baritone up to Putt. Gonu-Cocci girl & cove with pig’s ear violin.

F
Entry.171:
One short shower. E goes to S’bury. I go to R.B.A.A. & play Piano for Service. Recd letters from Mum. Bess. Bong & Lotte Watman.

Wrote to M.R.L.

W & F
Entry.172:
Photo of M.R.L. Recd. letters from Roy & Home George I go to Amesbury in the Pouring rain. Dine at 2 twice at Church Army Hut. Go all round the River Walk & met my 2 Girl Friends. Go Home to Tea. Walk Home in 45 minutes.

W & F
Entry.173:
Recd. letter from Home Lottie. Nette. Cyril. & Haversack White goes to W’mouth on 21.6.17

F & W
Entry.174: Wrote Doris. Go to S’bury Live on Peaches & Cream & have 5 meals altogether. Play Billiards in N.Z. Canteen. Tea at Council Chambers meet the Mayor & look at the Police Court from the Balcony, judge’s box & all. Buy powder for the Boys. Have tea at Edmonds & also at Ladyvale. Con & I sing while Ethel plays. I have a real happy time, happiest yet in England except with M.R.L & Jennie
Entry.175:
Cold & Dull very windy. Nothing doing E & I play Casino & He just wins 1 game out of 4. Wrote to Dad. Roy. Nette. Wrote to Geo. Mum. Lottie. M.R.L

F
Entry.176:
and foggy in Early morning. I write to Marg. & Bess. & to Uphaven Cricket Secty. Nin. Scott & Laurie & I go to Albany wards. We see the Girl Hand-cuff Queen.

F
Entry.177:
Go to R.B.A.A to play for Church. Tennis starts for the Boys. E goes to S’bury on the Bike. This should be Wednesdays Diary & Wednesday’s Tuesdays.

F
Entry.178:
I go to S’bury & Organ Recital. Con & I go on Hill & take Photos. We take 4 Photos on 2 Exposures & all old Photos of my Friends. More music & Singing

W
Entry.179:
We lie abed. No early Parade. D & I go to Palladium Hear joke about fowls & of the girl who would out of an animals mouth

W
Entry.180:
We again lie abed until 8A.M. Very rainy day. Nothin doing at all. I am Canteen Corporal & only have 2 fights at closing time.

F
Entry.181:
I go to S’bury. I meet Mr & Mrs Edmonds. We go for a walk all over the Town. I do not turn up to the Council till 6pm & then the Bulford Orchestra starts at 7pm. We have strawberries & cream. I take some sugar to my Friends. The Rivers are flooded. I come home alone. We buy a Bike & Ellis plays tennis

F
Entry.182:
Truck for Dad who used to push

We print Photos & I go for a ride to Fighledean & Amesbury. I come home very sore. My nose is again a bit Troublesome. Ellis plays tennis 

P.C of Snow 

F & W
Entry.183:
I am very bad with Nose. Have sponge bath & go to bed early. Have an hour at the Nets.

F
Entry.184:
Go to S’bury. Take two girls on the River. It rains so we go under the Railway Bridge. It fines up & we reach the Top of the River to take Photos. Eat of 1st cherries & go for a walk on Hill.

F
Entry.185:
E. goes to S’bury. I practise at the Nets & go to R.B.A.A. to play for service.

F
Entry.186:
Had 2 Hours at Nets. & go to Palladium with Dave. Nothing doing at all. Sent views to M.R.L.

F
Entry.187:
Wrote to White & Jennie & Recd. letters from M.R.L. Went to Place show

F
Entry.188:
Go to S’bury. Ellis goes to Wilcot on Bike. Meet W.H.D. & go to Tea at Ed’s. Then I go to C’s place & have a nice quiet time. Recd. letter from Alice Methven. Get another thunder storm coming Home but do not get wet. Have terrible stomach pains & forget to return Pass. 

W
Entry.189:
Dull miserable Sent S’bury Views to M.R.L. Milton Townsend comes to see us. Krogh & I go to Milstone & Durrington I mend my white shorts

W
Entry.190:
Write Home to Mum. Am Canteen Corporal again.

F
Entry.191:
I ride through Woodford to Salisbury. Meet Mrs Edmonds sit in Victoria Park for an Hour. We go for a walk on Harnham Hill & take Photos. Ride Home in 65 mins & race motor from Amesbury.

F
Entry.192:
E. goes to S’bury. I go to RB.A.A. but no church. We go to Albany Wards I see cove do musical turn same as on Kursaal in. Egypt. Recd letter from M.R.L.

F
Entry.193:
Our Boys got beat at Cricket I go to try find some new but fail. Set 2 mills off Porton

F
Entry.194:
Nothing doing. I am orderly corp. Go to the Pictures with Nin & have an Hour at the Nets

F
Entry.195:
Go to Salisbury. No one at Home No 13. Olive new Kitchen. I buy new tyres wait for El. on the Bridge & five of us go for down the River. Rotten boat & I have a hard time. Meet Mrs Wilson standing on the River Side with a pretty girl, not another George Miller.

F & Showery
Entry.196:
I go to see the new villages of Allington & Boscombe. I write to M.R.L. & Dad. Darn socks & my drawers & P.C. to M’ Voland

F
Entry.197:
A couple of slight showers. E goes to S’bury. I go to wards with Nettleton. A chap says the crowd off the stage, I thought that I was in Sydney at Manly. last rain at 6pm

F
Entry.198:
Had letter from Connie and read it. I ride to Salisbury along old main road through Beech Avenue with a Yankee Photographer. I go to Carpet factory at Wilton & spend day with Edmonds. Meet young Edmonds

W
Entry.199:
Recd letter from M.R.L. Went up to R.B.A.A. for Church & came back as chucker out in the Canteen

F & W
Entry.200:
Wrote to Jennie. Go to Albany Wards with Niness

F
Entry.201:
Wrote a letter to M.R.L. before breakfast. Went to H’cott on Salisbury by Train & bike to H’cott for D.C.M. & to the Close for Tea Supper & rode home shortcut which was 2½ miles further. 

F
Entry.202:
Go to S’bury again Go on River. Meet again after meeting Him with Pals to Stadium on road to H’cott.

Eric Hynde was over on Friday. Our Comforts arrive with the Cigars etc. Wrote Mum. Had P.C. from Reub. King

F
Entry.203:
Nothing Doing Walk to Durrington & Lark Hill with Niness. Reg. Kenke was over to a funeral.

F
Entry.204:
Recd. letter from Roy & Esme Preddey: am Ord. Corp. Wrote to Dad.

F
Entry.205:
Rode to S’bury back to S’henge & then to S’bury with C & Nurse. Come Home in Train. I have horrid Time. recd. 2 letters from Connie & one from White

F
Entry.206:
Recd letter from Marion Clarke. Marge. Bess. Marie Hudson, & from dad 2 from Mum & 1 from George Go to RB.A.A. but no church & go to Albany Wards

F
Entry.207:
Recd. P.C. from m’selle Voland from France. Also P.C. from Connie. Met Lieut Courtney from Manly yesterday.

F
Entry.208:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. I am very tired & go to bed early Billy Ali comes over & gets his parcel.

F
Entry.209:
I go to S’Bury. Buy new Tyre. C & I go on River & tie up under Willow Tree (2 Hours) ride Home under the Hour without getting off the bike. I spend my last sovereign

Recd. Photos of Marg. Laura & Marion on Wednes. last. Recd. Parcel of Comforts from Mrs Thomas

F
Entry.210:
Thunderstorm at 4pm Ellis rides to S’bury. I write to Roy. M.R.L. Esme. Marg & Mr Devereaux. Bess. Marion. Canteen Corporal & I take ¼ of a Ham. Nin is a bit sick. I get some Provisions

W
Entry.211:
I do about 1½ washing my clothes. I start Ward master & Ellis stays in office. Recd. letter from Jennie.

W
Entry.212:
Rode to S’bury in 40 minutes. We go to Floradora. I ride Home with Tommy in 75 minutes. Nice day for riding. 

W
Entry.213:
Recd. letter from Devereaux. This was the rainiest day I have had in England. Ellis goes to S’bury by Train. Wrote to Mum Went to R.B.A.A. for Church.

W
Entry.214:
Recd letters from Doris & M.R.L. Mrs Thomas. M.R.L. & Mr Schofield Wrote to D Jones. Devereaux & Dad

W
Entry.215: I am Order. Corp. Vic Digre came to see me & I was out.
Entry.216:
Dull & showery I go to S’bury It is fine all the time that I’m on Bike. I go to Edmonds & Town Hall for Concert. See the Mayoral Procession. I ride Home with pains in the Bingee & learn that 

F
Entry.217:
D & E go to .... on Bikes. I recd. letter from France redirected from Burwood from Maynie. Wrote to Jennie & George

F
Entry.218:
E goes to S’bury I do nothing but watch Cricket & Billiards sew Button on Pants

F
Entry.219:
I ride to S’bury in 50 & return in 50. Go on River Twice & have real good time as usual

W
Entry.220:
E goes to S’bury. I go to R.B.A.A. for Church. I get my money from D.Jones. Wrote to Aunt. Annie.

W
Entry.221:
I am Canteen Corporal, but go to the Pictures with Krogh. I hear a girl Ventriloquist. My 7 days leave is granted.

W 10/817 Fri I start to play Cricket but it rains. I go to Albany Wards with Dave & see Dick Whittington & His cat. Dave get a knock on the ear with Cricket Ball.

W
Entry.222:
Had letters from Alice Meth. Bill Ali. & M.R.L. Go to S’bury by Train. Meet Bill. We play Billiards in the St Martin Club Part of which is 100 years old. We come home in Record Time by Train. I offer Pound Notes to the Girls for fun. We go for a walk on Harnham Hill & all are very quiet.

F
Entry.223:
Lovely Day. I go for a stroll on the Downs with Dave & He sits yarning till 1st Post. Wrote Home.

W
Entry.224:
E goes to DCM at H’cutt & I am very busy till 8.40pm Get ready for I wrote Con.

W
Entry.225:
Go to London with Krogh. Have a hussy girl waitress. Travel to L’pool with Belgian, Kent man, Scot Irish, 2 Jack Tars. We eat fruit & cake. Sleep at the Angel. Wrote to Ellie, Dad. Con.

F
Entry.226:
Lovely day. Calm sea. Arrive Douglas at 4.15. Meet M.R.L. & we see St Georges & Athol St School & Harris Terrace. We sit on the Prom & arrive Home after being Teased all the way in the Train. 

F
Entry.227:
We go to Ballabane in the afternoon cos’ Septer wont work with Kitty. We go for a walk in the morning & we try to get some Tomatoes.

F
Entry.228:
We go to Ballaugh for the Bike & come home via Sulby. Tin Kippers, Herring & Mackerel fresh & pickled. Quite an R.C. today 

F&W
Entry.229:
We ride to Ramsey. I get very Talkative under shelter in the Park. We have tea in Ramsey & walk a good part of the way back. M. is too fast on the Bike. We have musician evening. I forgot my Cape & lost a golden opportunity. Wrote P.C. top Con

F
Entry.230:
We go nowhere except for a walk to the "Rowler". Have a serious talk & I get my deserts. On Monday A & M climb up Bank after uncle 

F
Entry.231:
We Bike down to the Beach with our dinner. We have trouble over the Tea. M. tears Stock & gets all over Jam A & M come down & we go along beach. We have a good Talk at Home & . Thinks SW&A. Thinks Sleep

F
Entry.232:
Wet as we arrive in L.pool miss 2pm Train by 2 minutes. Go to Art Gallery & go into room with murals & see all nude women. Arr. Sbury 2.30. Leave S’bury 2.45. arr. Bulf 3.55am. Get 1 ½ hours sleep

F
Entry.233:
Had letters from Jack P. Auntie Annie Roy. Mem. Nette. Jennie. Wrote M.R.L. (2 lett). P.C. Home of Con & I & one to Con. Go to Pictures with Dave & E. goes to S’bury.

W
Entry.234:
D & E go to S’land by the 10a.m. Played Cricket & got 8 N.O. We won by 30 runs. Very windy To-day. Wrote Home (8) & to Auntie & M.R.L.

W & Windy
Entry.235:
Recd letters from Home (40) with wattle inside. Nette. Marg. Bess (2) Mrs White. Miss Robson Nell. M.R.L. papers from Dad & Mem. Wrote 4 lge F’cap 4 of Red. Cross. Paper. Cox & I develop films in one LAV.

F
Entry.236:
I am ord. Corp Print a dozen Photos in morn. Letter came back from Auntie sent by Ellis. Wrote MRL. sent 9 Photos. Wrote Jennie. M.Voland. Roy. Jack Preddey & Doris. Nice day bit windy. Wrote note to Con & sent Photos to be printed. Lent CR the Bike. Dream of all that I wrote to

W
Entry.237:
2 years enlistment. Bulford play Tidworth & lose by a few runs. Played in the rain all the Time. Barborn got 1 stumped. Dad. Mum. A. Meth. Wrote Maynie. Bess (Laura Nell)

W
Entry.238:
Rained all day. Recd. letter from M.R.L. Auntie A & Con. Gibbo & Laurie & I had supper together awful day. I have tooth ache too Wrote Nette. M.R.L.

W
Entry.239:
Recd. 2 Peoples. 2 Sydney Mails Chocolates from Alice Methven

Ellis comes home.

Wrote to Miss Robson Mrs Whitehead Mem & Marg. Mrs Clarke & Auntie.

W
Entry.240:
I go to Salisbury to Both places & take boots to be repaired. Elsie & I play Duets. C & I go on Hill for walk. Recd. pair of socks from Miss Robson

F&W
Entry.241:
Rotten day. Canteen Corp but go to Albany Wards. & see picture of unrequited Love All men are branded & Nin gets marked C3 on Friday Wrote to M.R.L.

F
Entry.242:
Lovely Day. Go to Brimstone Bottom in Motor with Gibbo. Take some snaps from Car. Ride round D’ton & Amesbury after Tea

Wrote to M.R.L. & P.C. to Dad & Geo. Al. Meth & Miss Robson.

W
Entry.243:
Fine after dinner. Ride to Salisbury & get a little bit wet on Amesbury Hill Go to Peg o’my heart with Krogh & Marion. Go to Close & sit & talk. Then C & I go to Peg of my heart in the cheap (1/6) place. Have Chocolate Dates. I ride Home on a perfectly glorious night & my leggings

F
Entry.244:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. also Hanky’s. Nice day. Dave come up for a yarn. Wrote Mum & sort out Photos & to M.R.L. & Photos. 6 Pages.

F
Entry.245:
Glorious Day. Just as it might be in Aussy on the same date. Recd. P.C. . Have an hour at the Nets. Buy Jack’s Encyclopedia. Wrote to A. Annie Home

F
Entry.246:
Ride to S’bury 45 & out in 55". Walk to Britford with C. Get my boots Repaired & get new Wrist Strap. Eat peaches & Plums pears & apples. Bonnie Fruit. See the Britford Church Books (1,800)

F&W
Entry.247:
One light shower at 2am I’m orderly Corp. Nin is sick in bed all day & on milk Diet. Rains all afternoon. B4 Gets measles! Write M.R.L.

F
Entry.248:
Very Hot. I spend 2 Hours with Nin after Tea. We all have a very trying Day. Do a little reading also.

Recd. letter from MRL & wrote (1) in Return

F
Entry.249:
Lovely & Hot too. I go down & yarn to Dave for a couple of Hours again

Wrote Birthday Cards to Rube & Lyd.

F
Entry.250:
Glorious Day equal to our own September Days. Rode to S’bury via old Roman Road. Send out Patient by name of Coppin. May’s cousin. Talk with Linguist. Ride to S’bury & go on River. Mabel comes in for Tea. Cheese is very lively. Con & I play Duets. Ride Home in the storm. Not very tired either. Wrote P.C to Mum

Scotch Mist
Entry.251:
Pato. Mil. Townend & Reg. Close come over. We have a very long chat. Dreamt of Frances & all the Burkes turning me down. Wrote to Connie & Bess & the Bookshop. Recd. letter from Dulce. Wrote M.R.L.

F
Entry.252:
E goes to London & all the old boys go to W’mouth . Go to see merry Widow with Krogh. Come Home & go to bed to Read. Recd. letter from Con & M.R.L. Young Mil. Townend reports for Duty.

F
Entry.253:
Recd letters (2) from dad (2) Mum George. Dot. Mem. Hilda. Morg. Bess. Mrs Merrett. Am Canteen Corporal but go to Pictures with Krogh & R.A.M.I.

Wrote M.R.L.

F
Entry.254:
Rode to Salisbury in 32 minutes Got Photos Went to Salis. East for an Hour. Played the piano for 2 Hours Go on Hill for a walk. Go to Town Hall Concert. Ride Home with Puncture. Get Apples at Amesbury. Melt Frank Fremantle.

F
Entry.255:
with a couple of light showers. Very cold day. Am Ord. Corp. Have apple Pie Supper. Recd. letter from Jennie Nin Sick again. Dreamt of May in Lace & shop. Figure like Em. Middleton & work in Victoria Markets. Wrote to Mum 

W&F
Entry.256:
Slight showers this morning. Recd. letter from M.R.L. Pay Parade. E goes to merry Widow. Wrote to Otto. Wrote to M.R.L. Dad. Geo. White. Nancy

F
Entry.257:
Rode to S’bury. Lovely Day. Go on River with Frank & C. Go on Hill with F & Els. Music. Ride Home & get punished at Amesbury riding without a Back light. 

F
Entry.258:
A few light misty showers. E goes to S’bury. Tom Lindsay & Ted Grundy come over. I develop Film Recd letter from Quinn. Wrote to Mem. Dave comes up for a couple of Hours.

D
Entry.259:
with Showers of Rain. I Print Photos & join Australian Footy Team Raining from 7pm till Bed Time.

Wrote Doris. Marg. M.R.L. & send Mail Bess. Dulce.

W
Entry.260:
Go to S’bury to Edmond. then go to close. Have lots of music. Go by train & go with Min & Come Home also. Very Black nights. Recd. letter from Roy. Devereau & M.R.L.

W
Entry.261:
Parade for Lecture Rain all day. Am Canteen Corporal Go to A. Wards with Mr Hunt Lovely night. Hear Hil’s engaged. Hilda. Bertha. Marjorie. Wrote to Chris. Mrs Merrett. Quinn

F with one shower
Entry.262:
We have Dud. Proud in to see us. E.D & I go to "Gipsy Love" Leading Lady’s name Marie. Have a kick of the Footy. recd. letter from M.R.L.

F
Entry.263:
Lovely Day. Recd letters from Dad. Mum. Bess. Doris. PC from Connie. I mark out Footy Ground. Wrote to Con. M.R.L. but did not post till Sunday

F
Entry.264:
Go to S’bury by Train. Play piano all afternoon at E’s . Go to Palace at 7pm, with Elsie. Then home to Supper & play Piano. Meet Noel Smith on Bulford Station.

We leave S’bury at 10.45pm & reach Bulford at 1a.m. N goes with Tap to see Tab from London. Write P.C to M.R.L. at E’s & post.

F
Entry.265:
Meet Jim Vernon. E. goes to S’bury on Pleasure & Duty. Recd. P.C. from Ralf King & Paper from Laura Wrote M.R.L. Jennie. Roy. Wrote to Clare. Laura. Bess. Amy. Jess. Mrs Stephen Esme Geo. Dad. Mum & Gran Maisie carter Jess. M. Mr Love

F
Entry.266:
Lovely Day. Recd. Paper from Home. Ellis comes Home early & is Knocked up. I am Orderly Corp & have a long day. Wrote Geo Lane. Alma. France. Edie. Doris.

F
Entry.267:
Ride to S’bury & Home in 34 minutes. Play piano all afternoon & go to close. E & I have lots more on 26 Recd. letters from Dad & Mum & Bess. I get towed behind motor car

F
Entry.268:
but rain in afternoon. Go to W’mouth by Ambulance Rly Car with 22 men. Have Hot dinner on Train & Tea also/ See Weymouth clock & beach drive to Bournemouth 7pm. Meet Billy O’Neill (Lacrosse)

F
Entry.269:
Recd letters from M.R.L. wrote A P.C. Methven Meet Stewart Rowe Get up at 8am. Go for stroll on Front Get Telegram at 10.15. Taxi to House all gone. Look everywhere except on Pier. Have swim, dinner & go rowing & walk along Cliff Ride in Cliff & Lifts. Through S’hampton & Eastleigh. Go to Close

F
Entry.270:
Go to P. D on Summary of Evidence. Kit Inspection Pass Tidworth Station at same Hour & same day 12 months ago 

Met Stewart Rowe & Major Buy more Duets & go to East Sarum for 2 Hours & finish at close

F
Entry.271:
Recd. letters from Dad & Mum Nell Cuneo. Nette. Bertha. Edie. T. Esme. Send X’mas Cards Home. Cohen’s Cuneos & Clarkes. Wrote to M.R.L. Am Canteen Corporal

Wrote Auntie Hannah on Sunday. I rode to Rollestone But meet Billy at Dean’s place in Shrewton. I her that Bert Cocks & Scotchy McPherson are there.

F
Entry.272:
Last week have been the loveliest days yet spent in England & loveliest moonlight nights. Recd. letters from Marg. Dulce. Bess. George & 4 from Home. Wrote to Mum & sent PC to Dad.

F
Entry.273:
Lovely Day & glorious night. We move our office. Ken. Krogh. Weir & I go to see 7 days leave. Wrote to M.R.L. Recd. Photos.

F
Entry.274:
Went to Sarum on Bike. Went on River. Walked Harnham Hill. C & I play Duets. We are very quiet. Ride Home in the Sprinkling Rain. Am ord. Corp. but clear out

F & Wet
Entry.275:
but Dull. recd letter from Carter. Am ord. Corporal. Wrote Norm. Upton. Sent Photos of E & I to Aunt Annie. Wrote to Marge. Nette, Dad. George. Alice. Esme. Dulce. Mem.

W
Entry.276:
El. away at Sarum & Codford since yesterday. Had letters from W.H.A. & M.R.L. with Photos. Men from 17 F. Amb. come for Experience. Wrote to Bess. Nell. Edie T.

W
Entry.277:
We have our 1st Winters Day. J.D.V goes to C.T.D. We have rain & hail. Sent Photo to Maisie & Bert Cocks.

F
Entry.278:
but cloudy & . Go to S’bury by Train. Dinner at N.Z. Y.M.C.A. Go to Cornish Charlies at 5.30pm meet Keith Younger. Go home with Mabel P. & bring E back to 15th T.B. Concert. I sit with 5 girls all alone. Lady in Train comes for my Protection. Mrs Hudson to be. Lonely moonlight night but very wintry all day.

W & Misty
Entry.279:
Wrote to Dad. Mum photo. George. Reub. M.R.L. We start our fire going. A real Winters day

W
Entry.280: Recd letter from Norm Upton on
Entry.281:
Go over to lark Hill for Summary Evidence on POV . Rains on the way Back. Meet Sid. Muddle an officer in 33 Btn. See Capt. Donovan rear of A.T.M.C. in Costume

F 9/10/17 Tues with some showers at night. Bike to Sarum. Walk around & through Nunton & Adstock. See Cherubim in Odstock Church. I try to pinch apples but no good. Dream A.T.M.C. & Black Girl

F
Entry.282:
Recd. parcel from Home with Butter etc. Recd letter from Jennie. I am Canteen Corporal Go to bed at 9.30pm

F
Entry.283:
Go to Albany wards & see one-legged dancer. Recd. parcel from Bess & letter from Maisie. Krogh goes to London. E. goes to Billiards. I meet Nic. Digre again. Go down to see D. Dream of Taking Girl on sea voyage.

F & Wet
Entry.284:
Recd. letter from M.R.L. & Aunt Annie. Wrote to M.R.L. & Aunt Annie. & Bess Cuneo P.C. & Jennie. Windy wet night

F
Entry.285:
Ride to P. Downs. Meet Stew. Rowe. No one at camp. Go to L’sall & Andover. Meet Wal. Patterson. Go to Salisbury See Nigger at Andover with big feet. Go to Council Chambers & meet jack Powell & Keith Youngen Stay to Concert. Go to Mabel’s House. Ride Home with General Stone. Go to Service in the Cathedral for a while. Stay at Council Chambers from 4pm to 6.30pm & 8 to 9pm. Dream of Con. Posing in short skirt on footpath at work also riding on my Bike.

F
Entry.286:
Lovely Day. am ord. Corp. Norm comes over. We go to Beacon Hill & Cholderton Back for tea. Play Snooker & I win with the Black. Walk to Stonehenge Inn with Him. Wrote 2 P.C. to Dad

F
Entry.287:
Lovely Day. Meet Alec. Ross. We all go to Theatre & Alec too. Have supper in Room. See Peg o’ my Heart. Nice but not as good as Salisburys

Wrote P.C. to Mum & George.

W
Entry.288:
Go to Fovant with Tommy Williams. Meet Bob. Ball & Sid. Muddle on Foy’s case. Go to close. Play Cards & Duets. Dine at Guest House.

W
Entry.289:
E goes to S’bury I go ord. Corp for a couple of Hours. Go to bed at 8.30. Dream of C & I on Stage & Acrobatic Girl makes a meet with me & Mette 

F
Entry.290:
Recd letter from M.R.L. Lovely Day. Recd letter from M.R.L. Fyall & I catch 5.40 to Sarum. I go to close. Leave at 8 til 9pm. sleep at Church Hall on Bridge Catch 7.30 to Sutton Veny. Wait all day. Not called. Tea at Warminster

F & wet
Entry.291:
Wait all day & nothing doing. Meet Stew. Rowe. Catch 7 pm back to Bulford. had to go to Codford & return same day. Was afraid to go to Close.

F
Entry.292:
lovely day. Ride to Sarum. Go to Mrs E . Go to Council Chambers to impromptu Concert. Everything is fixed up. Dream of King George & Princess Mary. We know where we are again. Ride Home. Lovely cool night.

Recd letter from Roy. Sent Photo to May Mel.

Dull. Rain at 7p.m.
Entry.293:
We lay Lino. on the floor & have a good clean up. Am Canteen Corporal.

Wrote Mum. M.R.L. Con. Roy. Maisie. Edie.T in French.

F
Entry.294:
Lovely Day. Catch 8.45am to London. Go to Chelsea. Go through Westminster Abbey & St Pauls. Just have 1 min to catch 4pm Train. Travel with two Ladies to Stafford Have Tea at Rugby. Go straight to bed at Angel Hotel

F
Entry.295:
Go down on the "Kelmun" to see Capt. Collister. Catch overhead Train to No 2 Queen’s Dock . Go on Fenella. Meet Susan. Go in Cabin. Cheese & Irish Stew make me sick. Have 2 hours sea-sickness. miss 7 & catch 8pm. M & Auntie wait 2½ Hours in Stable.

FW
Entry.296:
Uncle & I go to Ballabane on Bikes. Very Windy. Auntie & M.R.L. meet us on return. Have music after tea. Go all over Farm Yard. Go to Ballabane next day not this day. Fix Hay stack with Uncle

F&W
Entry.297:
M.R.L. & I just spend time quietly. Very rainy. We do nothing at all. I dream of M (2) having a lovely Time. Dream of all the Burke’s. Have fight with With Ellis.

F & wet
Entry.298:
M & I go on walk round lanes. See lovely Sunset. I learn all Her Ideas on Love . We have long walk. I go over to farm in 1 hour 5 minutes.

F
Entry.299:
M & I go round Selby Bridge & Craddock. Meet Australian Soldier. We have music at night. I dream of accident & groan & Kick & make all grunting noises

On Tuesday 30.10.17 Recd. letter & Photo Alice. Photos letter from Norm. Letter Dulce. Chris. Jennie. X’mas Cards from Nina & Muriel. P.C. from Con.

 

F
Entry.300:
Do nothing. I lie on mat before fire with A & M. We nearly let the fire out & do not think of Tea till after 8p.m. I learn of "Kismet" for M or I. Meet another witch (Mrs J)

F
Entry.301:
Ice on ground. M & A come to station. M. comes down to see me off. Meet on Boat. Not quick reach Lpool 3pm. Go to Pictures. See Picture of rejected l=v who m’s a dark eyed lass a week after reject. Reach London 10.30. Air raid. Sleep Morton College.

W
Entry.302:
Catch 6.25 train. Reach Salisbury 9 . Go to Close. Catch 11.10 Train. arr. Bulford 12.15p.m. E. is away at Codford. Wrote to Norm. Upton. Mum. & Muriel Davies. Alice. Dulce. Aunt. Annie.

F&W
Entry.303:
Am ord. Corp. Have busy Day. Read at night. Police bring summons for Henry Douglas & I won’t accept. Meet A. Braddock.

W
Entry.304:
Recd. letters from Nette. & Dad & Mum & Photo Mrs Merrett. Meet Alec. Ross. Nin comes up for a Talk.

Wrote to Norm. Con. M.R.L. (6p).

W
Entry.305:
Recd. Summons. Go to bed at 9p, to read but fall asleep very quickly.

Wrote Jennie. Photo Mrs Merrett. Frances Amy. Billy. Reg. Keirle. Bess. Chris.

W
Entry.306:
General mobilisation Meet Wal. Patterson. Things very quiet I am tired & go to bed very early.

Go down Yarmouth with Nin. Wrote Dad. Nette.

 

F
Entry.307:
I spend all afternoon with my Washing. Dream of M.R.L. and all the Dobsons

Wrote M.R.L.

F
Entry.308:
Canteen Corporal. Spent time reading & tidying up Room. Darn all my socks in afternoon. Dram that I natter with Mrs Stephen drowning

F
Entry.309:
Catch 8.45 Train. Leave Coat at Hotel and Go to Court. Fined 2/6. Poachers & Scorchers in Jail too. Go to Close. Ride to Downton. C very upset. We play Darts but things are . Sleep at Y.M.C.A.

F
Entry.310:
Catch 7.45 train to Fovant. Cycle to H’cott. Reach Salisbury at 12.45pm. Meet Bob. Cowan at Hurdcott. Go to Mrs E. Walk to Sarum with Kiddie & 3 ladies. Meet Mich. P go to Search Me Bring home the Bike.

Could not sleep.

W
Entry.311:
Am Ord. Corp. but do not get up for 7 parade. Recd. Parcel from Lotte. letter & Photos from Jess about Alan’s death. letter from George & Esme & Paper from Ame. Letter from M.R.L. & Roy.

Wrote to M.R.L.

W&F
Entry.312:
Recd. letters from Nette. Bess, Gran. Home (6) Marg. . Tidied up Room again. 

Wrote Aunty. Annie.

F
Entry.313:
Don’t go to S’bury. Play footy & get horribly Knocked about. Get my pants all ripped about in front of the Wac-acks. Ellis comes Home. Very sore & tired.

Wrote to M.R.L.

F
Entry.314:
Went to see Footy Match Developed Film. Go to bed early. Lovely day. Meet Norm. Smith. Too fed-up to write.

F & Dull
Entry.315:
Have a general clean up round the Division. We learn of our projected departure from Cubicle & do nothing at all. Dream of M.R.L. & save life

Dull
Entry.316:
but no rain. Fine Night. E & I go for walk round Block & see all Wack-acks & the Boys on the . Dream of Mum in Trinity Church & Aunt Annies dying. Wrote Mum Mrs Edwards & Con.

Dull
Entry.317:
E goes to Sarum. I go to bed at 8pm Nothing Doing

Wrote to Lotte & Norm. Esme Priddey George. Jess. Mather 

F
Entry.318:
Lovely Day. Norm & I go to Amesbury & Bulford & to both Shows. We have a very nice afternoon. We meet Scotchy MacPherson again

Recd letter from M.R.L.

F
Entry.319:
but mist in morning. E & I go to Theatre & see "A Thief" It is all about a boy who loves a married woman & the latter rejects him. It is a sad story. I understand. 

Wrote M.R.L.

Dull & Misty
Entry.320:
I go to Sarum. Go to Edmonds & Town Hall. Am not wanted so come home at 6p.m. I have a Buster just pass Cross Roads. Arrive Home 7.30pm. Recd letters from Home (2) Bess. Clare. Fitz-Lough. Lottie. Have supper & go to bed at 9pm. Had a letter from Reg. Keirle Friday Dream of Bess

Dull & Misty
Entry.321:
Am Ord. Corp. New parade starts at 7.45pm. Recd letter from Jess.M. Wrote M.R.L. Lotte (2) Clare. Wrote to Dad. Marg. Roy. Bess. Nette. Chris. Mrs Mel. Aunt. Fanny. Gran

F
Entry.322:
Recd letter from Con. Harry J. Pine E & I go to Sunshine Girl It is lovely, lovely night.

Wrote Con. Fitz-Lough. Mum

F
Entry.323:
Dull. Go to S’bury by train. Walk long way round fields Go to Palace Theatre with C. Mrs F has a letter for Home. Get attacked with severe Pains in Train. Have bad time. Recd. Parcel from Dot.

F
Entry.324:
Lovely Day I don’t get up til late. E goes to S’bury. I am canteen Corporal. Fellow found with Spinning Jennie in Canteen. 

F
Entry.325:
Glorious Day like Spring. Get coat from Hobdens. Take Val’s place as Ord Corp. Recd. letters from Jennie & Aunt A.

Wrote Aunt A.

F
Entry.326:
Lovely day but wind springs up at night. E. ord. Sgt. Sent Parcel to Aunt. A. I sew Tunic & generally mess about.

Wrote to D. Jones Ltd.

F
Entry.327:
very windy. Bike to Sarum. Go to Milford Mill with Mr Ed. Go to C.C. Concert. See Contortionist & sit at H.Q. Go to Close after. Ride Home with favourable wind. Dream. that a German prisoner attacks me. One that is working at B’ford. I get Frank’s gun & shoot Him. Dream. C is very nice & comforts me very much. arrive Home with a lather of sweat at 11.15pm.

F
Entry.328:
D. of M. Millar goes away in Boat & leaves on Train & goes away again. very windy all day. E & I go to B’ford for a stroll in the moonlight. I do a bit of Chasing the Bugle. Print some Photos. Recd letters & 1st X’mas Card from Maisie Hudson Wrote Dad & Mum & sent album leaves

F
Entry.329:
a bit showery at night am Ord. Corp till 6p.m. E. D. B go to "The Magistrate". D of . Have mushrooms in B’wood . Go to bed. See in Pyjamas (Pink). Plenty 

Wrote M.R.L. L & K Ada. Doris.

F
Entry.330:
but windy. Nothing doing all day. Spent night writing letters. Wrote Jess. George. Bertha Mem. Mrs Stephen. Maisie. Hudson.

F
Entry.331:
but Dull. Recd. 7 letters from Home. Cards from Mr Ali. White. Alma & Fat. Letters from Mrs Mel (Photo) Nette. Marge. Edie. Bess. Bertha. Marion. Canteen Corporal. E goes to Sarum. Wrote Mrs Mel. Nette. Edie. Bess. Marg. White. Dream of jess.

F
Entry.332:
Recd letter from C. Go to Pictures see Charlie in "Vagabond". End of month. Plenty Work. Wrote to Con. Marion. Clarke & Clare.

F & Dull
Entry.333:
Recd letter from M.R.L. Go to see Mr Wu, early show. very good. It is not cold & I wrote till 10.30pm without Fire

Wrote Jennie. Alma. Mrs Ali. M.R.L. & sent Photos & Birthday Card

F
Entry.334:
Rode to Sarum. Go to C.C. . See the Dominoes & they are O.K. Walk all round Sarum to buy Butter & Dripping. No Good.

Recd. letter from W.H.A. Lovely Ride Home in Moonlight. Met chap from Farr St, Dee Why. He knows Nette Nelson too

Wrote 3/12/17 to D J’s 

F
Entry.335:
Perfect Day. read all afternoon. Officers play Hockey. I have big supper. 

Wrote Mum & sent snaps. Sent Photo to Maisie P.C. to dad & George.

F
Entry.336:
Go to Albany Wards. E. D & I. Have Hockey meeting. Rotten show & E goes crook at Concertina

F
Entry.337:
Tries to snow & I go to S. by Train. Go for walk & after Tea up to Edm. for a walk 

Temp way below Zero. Recd. letter from A. Annie.

F
Entry.338:
Am Ord. Corp. E. goes to S. Recd. letter from Norm. Upton.

Wrote to Mum & Dad. Dream that washed overboard in Indian Ocean

F
Entry.339:
but very heavy Frost. Dream that Maisie has pony in our Hand cart

We play Hockey against the Colonel etc. & play a draw. We have a supper in Honour of the occasion Reg. Top. E & I. I am elected Secretary of mess etc. Write to George.

W
Entry.340:
Misty Rain. Nothing doing I read my Book "Our Mutual Friend.

Wrote Billy. Norm. Con. M.R.L. Supper

F but Dull
Entry.341:
Stay in all afternoon & read Book. E & Top go out for a walk. Nothing doing after Tea except Read.

Supper in a Paisley shawl SV raiment R. E. booked.

F but Windy & Cold
Entry.342:
I go to Durr’ton for a walk alone. Play piano have Tea & return by 8p.m. Read book again.

Wrote Marg.

F but Dull.
Entry.343:
Practice Hockey & get two lovely cracks on the shins. Put plasters on & go to bed. Read & finish Our Mutual Friend. Recd. Letter from M.R.L Supper & bed. 

F
Entry.344:
Glorious Day. Ride to Sarum Go to Mrs E & Mr F. Buy music in London Rd. Go over Cathedral 8p.m. See Earl of Salisbury Tomb who was killed outside Jerusalem 200 years ago.

F
Entry.345:
Icy. Play Hockey Scratch match. Have Tooth filled. E goes Sarum. Recd. Letter from Jennie. I vote for Conscription Wrote Home. Bertha. Dream of Mary P. at the .

F
Entry.346:
Lovely Day. Am Ord. Corp. Play Hockey for officials against A.S.C. We win 3 to 2. Get ready for London.

Wrote to M.R.L & Jennie.

F
Entry.347:
Lovely Day. Catch 8.45am for . Dinner at Lyons’. Go to D’Js. Met Devereau & miss Bob Davies. Have afternoon Tea. Meet William from B’wood. Meet Keogh. Go to Inside the Linez at Apollo Theatre.

F
Entry.348:
Lovely Day. Breakfast 8.30. Go H’born Regent St Oxford St Selfridges. Dinner met Sid. Herbert. Gen. Howes. Noel Holmes, Aus Jones. Les Walsh. Bob Cleland. Go to Zig-Zag. Catch 5.50 train for Bulford. Home at 9p.m. Supper welcome Fried steak & fried bread. Learn of E.T. Stunt at G’gow .

Recd letter from Roy.

Snow
Entry.349:
Our First Snow. Recd. Letter from M.R.L. Dick. Ellis & I go for Walk. Take Snaps. Dave comes us for Talk. Have good supper am Canteen Corpor.

Wrote Home.

Ice
Entry.350:
Hard frost. Ground to slippery to walk. Norm. comes up & we talk till Supper Time over the Fire

Ice
Entry.351:
Run all way top Train Pains in legs all the way. Buy presents & distribute same. Go up London Rd for music. We all write letters, very cold. In Train. Wrote M.R.L by fireside

Ice
Entry.352:
E. goes to Sarum. Go down with until 8.15pm. We rearrange the Tables. Have Bath & go to bed at 10.30pm. Sent cards to Fremantle, Aunt Annie, Jennie, Mrs Edwards.

Ice
Entry.353:
Still icy. We alter stove. Pay two German Prisoners. Get nasty cold. Room lovely & warm. We have nice quiet time Photos. to Rube. Gwen. L. Robson. 

Ice
Entry.354:
Begins to thaw at 4pm. I am Ord. Corp. write a lot of P.C’s.

F
Entry.355:
Nice Day. Go to Sarum. Go to Mrs E. & also to Cou8ncil Chambers & Mr F. Meet Frank again. Meet Civic for Bulford Bridge in Train. Get Home at 12.45am. See Winnie.

Recd. Letter from Aunt Annie.

F
Entry.356:
Lovely Day. E Tops & I go to D’ton. I serve Tea for them. We all get Home tired, I play the Piano a little. Letter from Jim. Roddie Wrote W.H.A. George, Aunt Annie. Roy Wrote George Millar. Nurse Hilda. Jim. Reg Duke Wellington.

F
Entry.357:
Go with D & E to Albany Ice. Wards. Not bad show. Am Canteen Corporal & have a hell of a Time & get in a very bad Temper. Have good supper & go to bed.

F Ice
Entry.358:
Lovely Day. Good Dinner. Go to D’ton with Med for May. Round through Milstone with Clancy. P.Cs to Dot. Dulce. Mam. Amy. Edie. Ida. & Wal. Jess Walker. Jess Matthew. Maynie Frances. Chris. Nette, Mrs Mel OSG Otto Bess Alice, M.R.L. Mum.

Ice
Entry.359:
E & I go to S’bury. Go to Victoria Park. Tea at Mrs E. E & Dolly come after Tea. We have a good Train Trip Home.

Recd. Cards from Laurie, A’s, Mrs E

Ice
Entry.360:
Am Ord Corp. Go on parades for Defaulters. O.S. Bertie goes on his own. Do Canteen Corporal & Night Corp. to m’night. Practice Hockey. Have a very busy night & miss Concert.

F
Entry.361:
Recd. Letter M.R.L. E goes to bed ill. I practice Hockey. Cleaned all my Boots etc. Go to bed fairly early

F
Entry.362:
H of a bustle to get away. Ride Bike Hang on Back of Amesbury Bus. Go to & then to Dance. Have lovely Time. Slow flow, fast music. I know all the girls out. It rains at 11pm. I stay at No 13. Lovely soft bed. Rise at 6pm next Day. Yanks make first appearance in Sarum Public life. Win is Home & I have a realy good Time till 12pm.

W
Entry.363:
Rise at 6pm & cycle Home. Arrive at 8pm. Busy Day. Meet NZ Soldat on Road Slept under Haystack.

Recd. Letter from Mem & Home & paper

F&W
Entry.364: Ice. Pretty busy Day. I am Canteen Corp & ord. Corp. till 9pm. Put two coves in clink. No lights in Room but we got Hurricane Lamp & have good Supper.
